content.text:
# List of honours of Malaysia awarded to heads of state and royalty

}}
This article serves as an index – as complete as possible – of all the honorific orders or similar decorations awarded by Malaysia, classified by Monarchies chapter and Republics chapter, and, under each chapter, recipients' countries and the detailed list of recipients.
States of Malaysia
Johor Royal Family
They have been awarded :
* Sultan Ibrahim, Sultan of Johor (as Yang di-Pertuan Agong, 31 January 2024 – present) :
**  Recipient (DKM, 5 June 2024) and Grand Master of Order of the Royal Family of Malaysia (since 31 January 2024)
**  Recipient (DMN, 2 March 2015) and Grand Master of the Order of the Crown of the Realm (since 31 January 2024)
**  Recipient (SMN, 3 June 1987) and Grand Master of the Order of the Defender of the Realm (since 31 January 2024) with title Tun
**  Grand Master of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (since 31 January 2024)
**  Grand Master of the Order of Merit of Malaysia (since 31 January 2024)
**  Grand Master of the Order of Meritorious Service (since 31 January 2024)
**  Grand Master of the Order of Loyalty to the Royal Family of Malaysia (since 31 January 2024)
* Raja Zarith Sofiah, Permaisuri of Johor (as Raja Permaisuri Agong, 31 January 2024 – present) :
**  Recipient of the Order of the Crown of the Realm (DMN, 5 June 2024)
Kedah Royal Family
They have been awarded :
* Al-Aminul Karim Sultan Sallehuddin, Sultan of Kedah :
**  Recipient of the Order of the Crown of the Realm (DMN, 15 October 2018)
**  Commander of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (PSM, 5 June 2011) with title Tan Sri
**  Warrior of the Most Gallant Order of Military Service (PAT, 25 September 2012)
**  Mention in dispatches (KPK, 1974)
**  Recipient of the General Service Medal (PPA)
* Che Puan Besar Haminah, Che Puan Besar of Kedah (as Raja Permaisuri Agong, 13 December 2011 – 12 December 2016) :
**  Recipient of the Order of the Crown of the Realm (DMN, 26 January 2012)
* Tunku Intan Safinaz, Tunku Temenggong of Kedah (Sultan Abdul Halim of Kedah and Tuanku Bahiyah's daughter) :
**  Commander of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (PSM, 10 October 2012) with title Tan Sri
**  Warrior of the Most Gallant Order of Military Service (PAT, 2010)
* Tunku Abdul Hamid Thani, Tunku Bendahara of Kedah (youngest son of Sultan Badlishah) :
**  Commander of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (PSM, 1 June 2013) with title Tan Sri
Kelantan Royal Family
They have been awarded:
* Sultan Muhammad V, Sultan of Kelantan (as Yang di-Pertuan Agong, 13 December 2016 – 6 January 2019) :
**  Recipient (DKM, 31 January 2017) and Grand Master of Order of the Royal Family of Malaysia (13 December 2016 – 6 January 2019)
**  Recipient (DMN, 7 December 2011) and Grand Master of the Order of the Crown of the Realm (13 December 2016 – 6 January 2019)
**  Grand Master of the Order of the Defender of the Realm (13 December 2016 – 6 January 2019)
**  Grand Master of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (13 December 2016 – 6 January 2019)
**  Grand Master of the Order of Merit of Malaysia (13 December 2016 – 6 January 2019)
**  Grand Master of the Order of Meritorious Service (13 December 2016 – 6 January 2019)
**  Grand Master of the Order of Loyalty to the Royal Family of Malaysia (13 December 2016 – 6 January 2019)
* Tengku Mohamad Rizam, Tengku Temenggong of Kelantan (cousin of Sultan Muhammad V) :
**  Commander of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (PSM, 9 September 2017) with title Tan Sri
* Tengku Mohamad Ridzman, cousin of Sultan Muhammad V :
**  Commander of the Order of Loyalty to the Royal Family of Malaysia (PSD, 9 September 2017) with title Datuk
* Tengku Razaleigh, granduncle of Sultan Muhammad V of Kelantan
**  Commander of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (PSM, 1973) with title Tan Sri
* Tengku Mahaleel, second cousin of Sultan Muhammad V of Kelantan
**  Commander of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (PSM, 2000) with title Tan Sri
**  Commander of the Order of Meritorious Service (PJN, 1998) with title Datuk
Negeri Sembilan Royal Family
They have been awarded :
* Tuanku Muhriz, Yang di-Pertuan Besar of Negeri Sembilan :
**  Recipient of the Order of the Crown of the Realm (DMN, 2009)
* Tunku Imran, Tunku Muda of Serting (second son of Tuanku Jaafar) :
**  Commander of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (PSM, 1992) with title Tan Sri
**  Member of the Order of the Defender of the Realm (AMN, 1980)
* Tunku Naquiah, Tunku Dara of Negeri Sembilan (first daughter of Tuanku Jaafar) :
**  Commander of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (PSM, 1998) with title Tan Sri
**  Member of the Order of the Defender of the Realm (AMN, 1977)
Pahang Royal Family
They have been awarded :
* Al-Sultan Abdullah Ri'ayatuddin Al-Mustafa Billah Shah, Sultan of Pahang (as Yang di-Pertuan Agong, 31 January 2019 – 30 January 2024) :
**  Recipient (DKM, 11 July 2019) and Grand Master of Order of the Royal Family of Malaysia (31 January 2019 – 30 January 2024)
**  Recipient (DMN, 14 February 2019) and Grand Master of the Order of the Crown of the Realm (31 January 2019 – 30 January 2024)
**  Grand Master of the Order of the Defender of the Realm (31 January 2019 – 30 January 2024)
**  Grand Master of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (31 January 2019 – 30 January 2024)
**  Grand Master of the Order of Merit of Malaysia (31 January 2019 – 30 January 2024)
**  Grand Master of the Order of Meritorious Service (31 January 2019 – 30 January 2024)
**  Grand Master of the Order of Loyalty to the Royal Family of Malaysia (31 January 2019 – 30 January 2024)
**  Warrior of the Order of Military Service of Malaysia (PAT)
* Tunku Azizah Aminah Maimunah Iskandariah, Tengku Ampuan of Pahang (as Raja Permaisuri Agong, 31 January 2019 – 30 January 2024) :
**  Recipient of the Order of the Crown of the Realm (DMN, 11 July 2019)
* Tengku Meriam, Tengku Puteri Seri Lela Wangsa of Pahang (Sultan Haji Ahmad Shah's first daughter) :
**  Commander of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (PSM, 1984) with title Tan Sri
* Tengku Muhaini, Tengku Puteri Seri Teja of Pahang (Sultan Haji Ahmad Shah's second daughter) :
**  Commander of the Order of Meritorious Service (PJN, 5 June 2022) with title Datuk
* Affendi Buang, Tengku Muhaini's second husband (as Chief of Defence Forces, 2 January 2020 – 5 September 2023) :
** Courageous Commander of the Most Gallant Order of Military Service (PGAT, 14 October 2017)
** Commander of the Order of the Defender of the Realm (PMN, 17 August 2020) with title Tan Sri
**  Commander of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (PSM, 9 September 2017) with title Tan Sri
** Loyal Commander of the Most Gallant Order of Military Service (PSAT)
** Warrior of the Most Gallant Order of Military Service (PAT)
** Officer of the Most Gallant Order of Military Service (KAT)
** Recipient of the Air Force Medal (PTU, 1990)
** Recipient of the Loyal Service Medal (PPS)
** Recipient of the General Service Medal (PPA)
** Recipient of the Malaysian Service Medal (PJM)
** Recipient of the National Sovereignty Medal (PKN)
** Recipient of the 16th Yang di-Pertuan Agong Installation Medal
* Tengku Azlan, Tengku Panglima Besar of Pahang (Sultan Abu Bakar's sixth son) :
**  Commander of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (PSM, 4 June 2011) with title Tan Sri
Perak Royal Family
They have been awarded :
* Sultan Nazrin Muizzuddin Shah, Sultan of Perak :
**  Recipient of the Order of the Crown of the Realm (DMN, 6 December 2014)
* Tuanku Bainun, Sultan Nazrin's mother (as Raja Permaisuri Agong, 26 April 1989 – 25 April 1994) :
**  Recipient of the Order of the Crown of the Realm (DMN, 1989)
* Raja Jaafar, Raja Muda of Perak :
**  Companion of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (JSM, 1990)
* Raja Iskandar Dzurkarnain, Raja Di-Hilir of Perak :
**  Commander of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (PSM, 20 October 2016) with title Tan Sri
* Tunku Soraya, Raja Puan Muda of Perak :
**  Commander of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (PSM, 20 October 2016) with title Tan Sri
Perlis Royal Family
They have been awarded :
* Tuanku Syed Sirajuddin, Raja of Perlis (as Yang di-Pertuan Agong, 13 December 2001 – 12 December 2006) :
**  Recipient (DKM, 2002) and Grand Master of Order of the Royal Family of Malaysia (13 December 2001 – 12 December 2006)
**  Recipient (DMN, 2001) and Grand Master of the Order of the Crown of the Realm (13 December 2001 – 12 December 2006)
**  Grand Master of the Order of the Defender of the Realm (13 December 2001 – 12 December 2006)
**  Grand Master of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (13 December 2001 – 12 December 2006)
**  Grand Master of the Order of Merit of Malaysia (13 December 2001 – 12 December 2006)
**  Grand Master of the Order of Meritorious Service (13 December 2001 – 12 December 2006)
**  Grand Master of the Order of Loyalty to the Royal Family of Malaysia (13 December 2001 – 12 December 2006)
**  Recipient of the Malaysian Service Medal (PJM, 17 April 2009)
* Tengku Fauziah, Raja Perempuan of Perlis (as Raja Permaisuri Agong, 13 December 2001 – 12 December 2006) :
**  Recipient of the Order of the Crown of the Realm (DMN, 2002)
Selangor Royal Family
They have been awarded :
* Sultan Sharafuddin Idris Shah, Sultan of Selangor :
**  Recipient of the Order of the Crown of the Realm (DMN, 19 February 2003)
* Tengku Ahmad Shah, fourth son of Sultan Salahuddin :
**  Commander of the Order of Loyalty to the Royal Family of Malaysia (PSD, 3 June 2000) with title Datuk
* Tengku Zahariah, third daughter of Sultan Salahuddin :
**  Commander of the Order of Loyalty to the Royal Family of Malaysia (PSD, 3 June 2000) with title Datuk
Terengganu Royal Family
They have been awarded :
* Al-Wathiqu Billah Sultan Mizan Zainal Abidin, Sultan of Terengganu (as Yang di-Pertuan Agong, 13 December 2006 – 12 December 2011) :
**  Recipient (DKM, 5 April 2007) and Grand Master of Order of the Royal Family of Malaysia (13 December 2006 – 12 December 2011)
**  Recipient (DMN, 27 February 1999) and Grand Master of the Order of the Crown of the Realm (13 December 2006 – 12 December 2011)
**  Grand Master of the Order of the Defender of the Realm (13 December 2006 – 12 December 2011)
**  Grand Master of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (13 December 2006 – 12 December 2011)
**  Grand Master of the Order of Merit of Malaysia (13 December 2006 – 12 December 2011)
**  Grand Master of the Order of Meritorious Service (13 December 2006 – 12 December 2011)
**  Grand Master of the Order of Loyalty to the Royal Family of Malaysia (13 December 2006 – 12 December 2011)
* Sultanah Nur Zahirah, Sultanah of Terengganu (as Raja Permaisuri Agong, 13 December 2006 – 12 December 2011) :
**  Recipient of the Order of the Crown of the Realm (DMN, 5 April 2007)
Governors of Malacca
They have been awarded :
* Mohd Khalil Yaakob, 6th Yang di-Pertua Negeri of Malacca (4 June 2004 – 3 June 2020) :
**  Grand Commander of the Order of the Defender of the Realm  (SMN, 4 June 2004) with title Tun
**  Commander of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (PSM, 1989) with title Tan Sri
**  Companion of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (JSM, 1979)
**  Recipient of the General Service Medal (PPA)
**  Recipient of the Malaysian Commemorative Medal (Bronze) (PPM (G))
** Recipient of the 11th Yang di-Pertuan Agong Installation Medal
** Recipient of the 12th Yang di-Pertuan Agong Installation Medal
** Recipient of the 13th Yang di-Pertuan Agong Installation Medal
** Recipient of the 14th Yang di-Pertuan Agong Installation Medal
** Recipient of the 15th Yang di-Pertuan Agong Installation Medal
** Recipient of the 16th Yang di-Pertuan Agong Installation Medal
* Mohd Ali Rustam, 7th Yang di-Pertua Negeri of Malacca (since 4 June 2020) :
**  Grand Commander of the Order of the Defender of the Realm  (SMN, 4 June 2020) with title Tun
**  Commander of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (PSM, 7 June 2014) with title Tan Sri
** Recipient of the 12th Yang di-Pertuan Agong Installation Medal
** Recipient of the 13th Yang di-Pertuan Agong Installation Medal
** Recipient of the 17th Yang di-Pertuan Agong Installation Medal
Governors of Penang
They have been awarded :
* Abdul Rahman Abbas, 7th Yang di-Pertua Negeri of Penang (1 May 2001 – 30 April 2021) :
**  Grand Commander of the Order of the Defender of the Realm (SMN, 1 May 2001) with title Tun
** Recipient of the 12th Yang di-Pertuan Agong Installation Medal
** Recipient of the 13th Yang di-Pertuan Agong Installation Medal
** Recipient of the 14th Yang di-Pertuan Agong Installation Medal
** Recipient of the 15th Yang di-Pertuan Agong Installation Medal
** Recipient of the 16th Yang di-Pertuan Agong Installation Medal
* Ahmad Fuzi Abdul Razak, 8th Yang di-Pertua Negeri of Penang (1 May 2021 – 30 April 2025) :
**  Grand Commander of the Order of the Defender of the Realm (SMN, 1 May 2021) with title Tun
**  Commander of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (PSM, 2003) with title Tan Sri
**  Companion of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (JSM, 1999)
**  Member of the Order of the Defender of the Realm (AMN, 1979)
** Recipient of the Active Service Medal (PKB)
** Recipient of the General Service Medal (PPA)
** Recipient of the 12th Yang di-Pertuan Agong Installation Medal
** Recipient of the 16th Yang di-Pertuan Agong Installation Medal
** Recipient of the 17th Yang di-Pertuan Agong Installation Medal
* Ramli Ngah Talib, 9th Yang di-Pertua Negeri of Penang (since 1 May 2025) :
**  Grand Commander of the Order of the Defender of the Realm (SMN, 25 April 2025) with title Tun
**  Commander of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (PSM, 1989) with title Tan Sri
**  Member of the Order of the Defender of the Realm (AMN, 1980)
**  Recipient of the 9th Yang di-Pertuan Agong Installation Medal (1989)
**  Recipient of the 10th Yang di-Pertuan Agong Installation Medal (1994)
Governors of Sabah
They have been awarded :
* Juhar Mahiruddin, 10th Yang di-Pertua Negeri of Sabah (1 January 2011 – 31 December 2024) :
**  Grand Commander of the Order of the Defender of the Realm (SMN, 1 January 2011) with title Tun
**  Commander of the Order of Meritorious Service (PJN, 1997) with title Datuk
** Recipient of the 14th Yang di-Pertuan Agong Installation Medal
** Recipient of the 15th Yang di-Pertuan Agong Installation Medal
** Recipient of the 16th Yang di-Pertuan Agong Installation Medal
** Recipient of the 17th Yang di-Pertuan Agong Installation Medal
* Musa Aman, 11th Yang di-Pertua Negeri of Sabah (since 1 January 2025) :
**  Grand Commander of the Order of the Defender of the Realm (SMN, 17 December 2024) with title Tun
**  Commander of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (PSM, 2017) with title Tan Sri
**  Companion of the Order of the Defender of the Realm (JMN, 1996)
** Recipient of the National Sovereignty Medal (PKN, 4 September 2014)
Governors of Sarawak
They have been awarded :
* Wan Junaidi Tuanku Jaafar, 8th Yang di-Pertua Negeri of Sarawak (since 26 January 2024) :
**  Grand Commander of the Order of the Defender of the Realm (SMN, 26 January 2024) with title Tun
**  Commander of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (PSM, 2023) with title Tan Sri
**  Commander of the Order of Meritorious Service (PJN, 2003) with title Datuk
**  Companion of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (JSM, 2000)
** Recipient of the Loyal Service Medal (PPS)
** Recipient of the General Service Medal (PPA)
**  Recipient of the National Hero Service Medal (PJPN)
** Recipient of the 14th Yang di-Pertuan Agong Installation Medal
** Recipient of the 15th Yang di-Pertuan Agong Installation Medal
** Recipient of the 17th Yang di-Pertuan Agong Installation Medal
Asian monarchies
Brunei Royal Family
They have been awarded :
* Sultan Haji Hassanal Bolkiah, Sultan of Brunei :
**  Honorary Recipient of the Order of the Crown of the Realm (DMN (K), 9 July 1980)
**  Honorary Courageous Commander of the Most Gallant Order of Military Service (PGAT (K), 29 October 1986)
* Pengiran Anak Hajah Saleha, Queen consort of Brunei :
**  Honorary Recipient of the Order of the Crown of the Realm (DMN (K), 19 August 2019)
* Prince Jefri Bolkiah, Pengiran Di-Gadong Sahibul Mal of Brunei :
**  Honorary Grand Commander of the Order of the Defender of the Realm (SMN (K), 8 April 1989) with title Tun
Japanese Imperial Family
* Emperor Emeritus Akihito :
**  Honorary Recipient of the Order of the Crown of the Realm (DMN (K), 19 February 1970)
* Empress Emerita Michiko :
**  Honorary Recipient of the Order of the Crown of the Realm (DMN (K), 19 February 1970)
* Emperor Naruhito :
**  Honorary Grand Commander of the Order of the Defender of the Realm (SMN (K), 2012) with title Tun
* Empress Masako :
**  Honorary Grand Commander of the Order of the Defender of the Realm (SMN (K), 2012) with title Tun
Thai Royal Family
* Queen Sirikit of Thailand :   Recipient of the Order of the Crown of the Realm (Darjah Utama Seri Mahkota Negara - DMN), 1963
* Princess Sirindhorn of Thailand :  Grand Commander of The Most Esteemed Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (SSM, 2009) with title Tun
to be completed
European monarchies
British Royal Family
* HM The Queen :  Recipient of the Order of the Crown of the Realm (Darjah Utama Seri Mahkota Negara, DMN, 1972)
Swedish Royal Family
* Carl XVI Gustaf of Sweden :  Recipient of the Order of the Crown of the Realm (DMN, 2005)
* Queen Silvia of Sweden :  Recipient of the Order of the Crown of the Realm (DMN, 2005)
* Victoria, Crown Princess of Sweden :  Grand Commander of the Order of the Defender of the Realm (SMN, 2005) with title Tun
* Prince Carl Philip, Duke of Värmland :  Commander of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (PSM, 2005) with title Tan Sri
* Princess Madeleine, Duchess of Hälsingland and Gästrikland :  Commander of the Order of Loyalty to the Crown of Malaysia (PSM, 2005) with title Tan Sri
to be completed
Republics
to be completed
